Get the battery status as an int Batt_MIN = 0; Batt_20Percent = 1; Batt_40Percent = 2; Batt_60Percent = 3; Batt_80Percent = 4; Batt_MAX = 5; Batt_CHARGING = 6; Batt_CHARGING_DONE = 7;
getBatteryName() - Method in class movelib.library.MoveController
Get the plain text version of the charge status "low" "20%" "40%" "60%" "80" "charging..."

Get the sphere's blue value
getConnection() - Method in class movelib.library.MoveController
Get how the controller is connected to the computer Bluetooth = 0; USB = 1; error = 2;
getConnectionName() - Method in class movelib.library.MoveController
Get how the controller is connected to the computer (in plain text) "Bluetooth" "USB" "Connection error"
getConnectionType() - Method in class movelib.library.MoveController
Get how the controller is connected to the computer.
getController(String) - Method in class movelib.library.MoveManager

getController(int) - Method in class movelib.library.MoveManager

Get how many controllers are connected to the computer.
